# Issue Templates

This directory contains GitHub issue templates to help contributors report bugs and request features.

## Types of Issues

1. **Bug Report** - Report a bug or problem
2. **Feature Request** - Suggest a new feature
3. **Documentation** - Documentation improvements
4. **Infrastructure** - Infrastructure/DevOps related

## How to Use

When creating an issue on GitHub, you'll see options to choose from these templates. Select the appropriate template and fill in all required fields.
